text: Absolyutno, relihiya povynna buty prysvyachena do BOHA yedynoho. Tsey khto vstanovlyuvaly idoliv bilya Yoho kazhemo, "My idolize yim til πky prynesty nam blyzhchym do BOHA; dlya vony ye u krashchiy pozytsiyi!" BOH bude sudyty yikh vidnosno yikhnikh superechok.
